en_title: LC: Speech by SJ on Motion on Committee Stage Amendments to Statute Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2014
zh_title: 立法會︰律政司司長就《２０１４年成文法（雜項規定）條例草案》全體委員會審議階段修正案發言全文

en: Following is the translation of a speech by the Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, on the Motion on Committee Stage Amendments to the Statute Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2014 at the Legislative Council meeting today (November 26):
I move the amendments to the clauses read out just now. The amendments to those clauses are set out in the paper circulated to Members.
I have already explained the purposes of the amendments earlier today. The Bills Committee has discussed and expressed support for the above amendments. I urge Members to pass these amendments.
zh: 以下是律政司司長袁國強資深大律師今日（十一月二十六日）在立法會會議上就《2014年成文法（雜項規定）條例草案》全體委員會審議階段修正案的發言全文︰
我動議修正剛讀出的條文。這些條文的修正案已載於分發給各位議員的文件。
今日較早時，我亦已解釋修正案的目的。法案委員會已就上述修正案進行討論，並表示支持。謹請議員通過這些修正案。

en: Following is the translation of a speech by the Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, on the Motion on Committee Stage Amendments to the Statute Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2014 at the Legislative Council meeting today (November 26):
I move the amendments to the clauses read out just now
The amendments to those clauses are set out in the paper circulated to Members.
I have already explained the purposes of the amendments earlier today
The Bills Committee has discussed and expressed support for the above amendments
I urge Members to pass these amendments.
zh: 以下是律政司司長袁國強資深大律師今日（十一月二十六日）在立法會會議上就《2014年成文法（雜項規定）條例草案》全體委員會審議階段修正案的發言全文︰
我動議修正剛讀出的條文
這些條文的修正案已載於分發給各位議員的文件
今日較早時，我亦已解釋修正案的目的
法案委員會已就上述修正案進行討論，並表示支持
謹請議員通過這些修正案
